title: Single Of The Week: DOOM/STARKS – Victory Laps
body:
Our relationship with **DOOM** and **Ghostface killah**’s collaboration began with a remix of album track, [_Victory Laps_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9134-new-doomstarks-victory-laps-madvillainz-remix/ "New: DOOM/STARKS – Victory Laps (Madvillainz Remix)"), around two weeks ago. At last the definitive, super fucking official, album version has dropped into the worlds eardrums. It’s heavier and it’s really fucking tight. Stream it below and have SUPER week.

 [DOOMSTARKS – Victory Laps](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad/doomstarks-victory-laps) by [crackintheroad](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad)
